title: A Sans font seen quite often...
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100331125040im_/http:/typophile.com/files/4ac16f55a100d5866a417814bc1b3d5e_4403.jpg)

Do you know what is the name ofthis font? It looks very used at the moment...
author: nic_-_mic

comments.content: Did you notice the 'R' is different than the Avant Garde 'R'? Any idea how? Or is it just the designer's own modification?

There are a lot of digitizations of [Avant Garde](http://web.archive.org/web/20100331125040/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/avant-garde-gothic/familytree.html). Dive into the bolder weights of [ITC Avant Garde Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20100331125040/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/itc-avant-garde-gothic/) und you'll find what you need.
